title: Kulich (Russian panettone)
ingredients: ['For the bread', '20g dried active baking yeast', '350ml warm milk (about 40 C), divided', '200g caster sugar, divided', '80g sultanas', '50ml rum', '750g plain flour, sifted', '5 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'pinch salt', '250g butter, softened', '80g almonds, chopped', '80g mixed peel', 'Icing', '1 egg white', '250g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon lemon juice']
